name: Revolutionary War io (opoly)
description:
On April 19, 1775, "The Revolt heard around the world" began a war for freedom called the American Revolutionary War or simply the Revolutionary War. It took the American colonists almost eight (8) long years to gain freedom from their colonial masters, Great Britain. Play Revolutionary War io and join the battle today.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
